info.elyasi.java.javafx_stimulsoft_maven_mysql

Class ReportViewer

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • com.stimulsoft.viewer.StiViewerFx
              • info.elyasi.java.javafx_stimulsoft_maven_mysql.ReportViewer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.stimulsoft.viewer.utils.StiViewSettings, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class ReportViewer
extends com.stimulsoft.viewer.StiViewerFx
    Custom report viewer for stimulsoft with focus to provide more controls on UI. Makes the localization simple and fix right_to_left issues of StiViewerFx.
    To localize a language, just put the corresponding file in the Localization directory and call localizationConfiguration method with file name and right to left value for specified language.
    Since:
    2018-07-06
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ghasem Elyasi (ghasem.elyasi@gmail.com)
    See Also:
    Stimulsoft, Author's website, Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • initial

        public static void initial(java.lang.String _server,
                           int _port,
                           java.lang.String _username,
                           java.lang.String _password,
                           java.lang.String _dbName)
        This method must be call before using ReportViewer to initialize it. it also must be called after any configuration methods of this class. Data Source name in the reports files must be "DataSet1"
        Parameters:
        _server - MySQL server ip or address
        _port - MySQL server port
        _username - MySQL username
        _password - MySql password
        _dbName - database name of related database in MySQL server.

      • localizationConfiguration

        public static void localizationConfiguration(java.lang.String _langName,
                                             boolean _isRightToLeft)
                                      throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                             com.stimulsoft.base.exception.StiException
        set localization of ReportViewer
        Parameters:
        _langName - name of the locale file in Localization directory without extension
        _isRightToLeft - is the language right to left or not
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - throws on wrong locale file path
        com.stimulsoft.base.exception.StiException - in case of any exception in Stimulsoft classes

      • createReport

        public static com.stimulsoft.report.StiReport createReport(java.lang.String _reportPath)
                                                    throws com.stimulsoft.base.serializing.StiDeserializationException,
                                                           org.xml.sax.SAXException,
                                                           java.io.IOException
        create a StiReport using report file path
        Parameters:
        _reportPath - report file path
        Returns:
        a StiReport object of given report file path
        Throws:
        com.stimulsoft.base.serializing.StiDeserializationException - in case of any exception in Stimulsoft classes
        org.xml.sax.SAXException - in case of any exception in ReportFile loading
        java.io.IOException - in case of any exception given file path

        shows created report in a JFrame
        Parameters:
        _stiReport - a StiReport object created by createReport() method
        _title - title of report. it will be shown as tab title

        private void moveNavigationToolbarToTop()
